main ( ) { int n , a , l , x = 0 , i , j , arr [ 10 ] [ 10 ] , b [ 5 ] , k ; printf ( "enter number of test cases
" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( a = 0 ; a < n ; a ++ ) { x = 0 ; printf ( "enter number of lines
" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; printf ( "enter the numbers
" ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ j ] [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( i == j ) x = x + arr [ i ] [ j ] ; } } k = a ; b [ k ] = x ; } for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) printf ( "%d" , b [ k ] ) ; }
